courseDescription:
If you've ever looked up an answer to a question on the internet, the chances are you found it on a blog. A blog is a website (or a section of a website) that publishes new content regularly about a specific topic. Think of it as a public journal or diary. Have you considered starting a blog to share your knowledge? This course will teach you how to create a fashion and lifestyle blog and provide tips and techniques to build your brand and make money. We first introduce you to the blogging industry, its benefits and some of its top niches. Great blogs are vibrant and visually appealing but also thoughtful and purposeful. We'll teach you the principles of writing great blog posts and explore some of the advantages of a fashion and lifestyle blog.

A great blog should always engage a target audience. A target audience is a community of regular readers who find your writing consistently valuable and entertaining. How can you find a target audience? First, explore the various apps and tools used to find a target audience, including the multiple platforms you can use to set up your blog and run it. We'll discuss how to construct and schedule a blog whilst filling it with content that entertains and engages the target audience. Once you have defined your audience and voice, it is time to start writing. Next, We'll show you some tips and tactics that will help you increase engagement on your blog via social media, comments, email newsletters and followers. On top of that, you'll learn to make your blog conform to the fashion and lifestyle niche so that your audience understands you while maintaining your originality. In addition, we compare different camera lenses and lighting techniques that will help inform their decision to shoot for your blog. 

The final part of this course focuses on monetising your blog. How can you make money as a blogger? The good news is that there are several ways to monetise your blog. If you follow best practices for blog monetisation, you can make a lot of money with your fashion and lifestyle blog. We'll guide you on partnering professionally with a brand and getting the most out of a relationship. You'll learn how to connect to others in the blogosphere and collaborate with other bloggers, including adding affiliate links to your website to monetise your blog. We have designed this course for learners who are passionate about fashion and lifestyle. This course is also vital for people who are already in the fashion industry and want to broaden their knowledge. This video-based course requires no pre-requisites or prior knowledge. If you are a passionate fashion lover, fashion blogging can be a very fulfilling and exciting venture for you. By the end of this course, you will have learned everything you need to start a fashion blog. So why wait? Enrol now and learn for free!
